member.name: M:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfDocumentRenderer.ConvertToMultipageImage(System.String,Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRendererSettings,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Converts the PDF document to a multipage TIFF image.
member.param: Range of pages to convert to image.
Settings used during the rendering process.
Output stream where the image will be stored.

member.summary: Converts the entire PDF document to a multipage TIFF image.
member.param: Settings used during the rendering process.
Output stream where the image will be stored.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat
member.summary: Specifies the supported formats for saving the page image.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.Raw
member.summary: The image is saved in RAW format. The byte order is specified by the rendering surface.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.Png
member.summary: The image is saved in PNG format.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.Tiff
member.summary: The image is saved in TIFF format.

member.summary: Creates a rendering surface fit for rendering the current page.

The vertical resolution used for converting the vector PDF page to raster.
